Package org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.tigr.tasm

This package contains classes to handle TIGR Assembler formatted assembly files.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    TasmAssembledRead  
    TasmAssembledReadBuilder  
    TasmContig
    TasmContig is a Contig that contains extra metadata attributes specific to the TigrAssembler format.
    TasmContigDataStore  
    TasmContigReadVisitor  
    TasmContigVisitor  
    TasmParser
    TasmParser is an interface that will parse a TIGR Assembler (tasm) formatted structure and call the appropriate visit methods on the given TasmVisitor.
    TasmVisitor
    TasmVisitor is a visitor interface to visit components of a single TIGR Assembler (tasm) file.
    TasmVisitor.TasmVisitorCallback  
    TasmVisitor.TasmVisitorCallback.TasmVisitorMemento
    TasmVisitorMemento is a marker interface that TasmFileParser instances can use to "rewind" back to the position in its contig file in order to revisit portions of the contig file.
    TasmWriter
    TasmWriter writes out TIGR Assembler formated files (.tasm).
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractTasmContigBuilderVisitor  
    TasmContigBuilder
    Builder for TasmContigs that allows creating TasmContig objects read by read by adding assembled reads and setting a consensus.
    TasmContigFileDataStoreBuilder  
    TasmFileParser
    TasmFileParser can create parser objects that can parse TIGR Assembler encoded files (.tasm files).
    TasmFileWriterBuilder
    TasmFileWriterBuilder builds a TasmWriter using which has been configured by the the parameters given to its various methods.

Package org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.tigr.tasm Description

This package contains classes to handle TIGR Assembler formatted assembly files. Files of this type are produced by the legacy TIGR Assembler program and usually have a file extension of .tasm or .asm. The .asm extension has been deprecated since it can be easily confused with TIGR Assembler's replacement, Celera Assembler, which also produces assembly files with a .asm file extension although the data is encoded completely differently.
